reviews_data.review_text: Room temp food, questionable listening skills...mid over all
The customer service here is amazing! And the food is delicious! I would recommend this place to anyone & everyone!
Americana coffee not so good!
Delicious bakery, sandwiches and coffee

Buttery flaky everything.. I order it on postmates or stop in on the weekends. The staff is always great and jolly. Jalape√±o Cheddar Biscuits are a must (have them warmed). Disclaimer, for me not all locations are as good as this one.
I love the sunflower bakery it is a very small cozy coffee House
Superb quality. Those cheese biscuits!!!!
Great cold brew and muffins .

I stepped by Sunflour bakery today, it was a wonderful experience. Nice place, so delicious menu. Friendly staff, I met Huda one of the staff their and she was so kind and helpful, she recommended their specialists, like morning glory muffin it was a "glory" , pumpkin muffin was so delicious The croissants were buttery and crispy. I probably should go back to try the  rest  of their menu as Huda recommended a lot! All I had was delicious and had  balanced flavor,  I will definitely go back .

The food is DELICIOUS, but the kitchen takes awhile. Today, my to-go order was never sent to the back kitchen so I'm waiting here for it (with a 1 year old, and 1 week old baby at home‚Ä¶ so I wanted it to be fast pickup). We have experienced this slower pace a few times, so I wouldn't come for a breakfast sandwich if you're in a rush ‚Äî but definitely come if you have some time. It's lovely location, friendly staff, and a delightful bakery.
No espresso machine working, coffee was alright. Sandwich was good. Extensive menu with different options
They have a really nice cookies
Cinnamon roll...do it...get it heated
Delish but the coffee sucks
Delicious pastries and first class coffee.
Great friendly staff,and delicious pastries
One of my favorites!!

Baking goods and breakfast were great. Everything is fresh. Place looks clean. Service is a little slow during busy hours but not too bad. They offer vegan products too. They have indoor and outdoor seating.

Wow what a great experience! I ordered delivery through Seamless for the first time, and a couple items weren't available -- I was immediately called and offered to substitute or receive a refund. The alternate options were incredible and I appreciated the kindness to even call and give me the option (instead of just canceling my order). I'm new to the area, but can't wait to visit in person and bring all my friends + family when they visit! Thank you!!
Cupcakes are great. Bonus: place smells of fresh coffee.
Cute coffee shop and atmosphere. Yummy pastries too
Coffee is good, save yourself the disappointment leave the rest there. Pastries are dry and lack flavor and other items they always make wrong. Just don't bother
With a price of $8 for breakfast sandwich and the extended  wait time you could at least get it right. What a waste
The pastries aren't good. They take too long and constantly get the order wrong. The coffee is great.
Waiting more than an hour for a sandwich because they forgot to pass my order,  incredible!
Great little breakfast spot in Ballantyne. Sandwiches, muffins and coffee are awesome. Wait can be a little long but worth it.
The morning glory muffin was amazing. Coffee was good too. The staff was friendly! Restroom was clean. I'd come back if I'm ever traveling in this area again!
Good internet and kind staff
Victoria, you did an amazing job with the gluten free chocolate cake with a vanilla buttercream icing!! It was delicious and perfect ü•∞

Had high hopes for this place when we visited as we live so close. We visited and had lunch on June 30th. The staff was nice and the food was good, but there was a dead roach under our table. I also noticed the place wasn't thoroughly clean. Hygiene is the most important for me; for that reason the two stars. We saw another dead roach by the window under one of the side tables. Hope they clean this place up!

I have been frequenting SBC for about 4 years, always the Ballantyne location and once for catering. I am a HUGE fan of the food and drinks (see below), but there are some hiccups that others also have identified that can be frustrating.  First off, the food: fantastic (and I mean fantastic!) pastries, croissants, muffins, sandwiches and the like. I have never, ever been disappointed. I have had breakfast and lunch there on multiple occasions. I stop by occasionally for afternoon tea. I once even made a large catering order for the hospital where I work. Surprisingly, not a lot of people at work had heard of this place, but the food (sandwiches, salads and drinks) were universally loved and I know, for sure, that that catered lunch led to a number of new enthusiastic SBC customers.  For caffeine enthusiasts, their roasts are high-quality and they have a diverse offering of coffees (all from local CLT-area companies) and teas. The tea, Rishi, is quality, but overpriced at more than $4/cup.  I genuinely appreciate that they emphasize their local roots, highlighting local ingredients and promoting other local companies in their products. Hooray for the small guys! The staff are always friendly and as helpful as possible.  The one see where I think SBC can improve is efficiency and communication. When I tried catering, I had to call due to a problem with my online order. The person on the phone, located at the Ballantyne location, had no idea how to solve my problem and said, ‚Äúsorry, we get no training for online orders.‚Äù I ended up paying more than I was supposed to. Similarly, in the store, i occasionally have long waits for items. More recently, I stopped by for afternoon tea. After 15 minutes of waiting, I went back up to the counter and the woman there sincerely apologized, saying, ‚ÄúI'm so sorry, I thought the other person had made it already.‚Äù  Despite these hiccups, which are human errors and mild in the grand scheme of things, I genuinely love SBC. I have brought many friends here, all of whom also have loved their products. I would highly recommend any time!
Nice to have a charming and quaint bakery in this city. All their pastries/breads/baked goods are delicious and taste freshly baked. And a good tea selection from a good brand for tea lovers.

I have been a huge fan of Sunflour Baking Company since moving to Charlotte 3 years ago but this location is absolutely awful. Today's experience was terrible and I will not be back.  I placed an online pickup order at 2:30 pm which was accepted and showed a pickup time of 3:04 pm. I arrive at 3:00 pm and am promptly told by one of the employees "Sorry, we're closed." After explaining to them that I am here to pick up my sandwich order which had a 3:04 pm pickup time, I was informed that they stopped serving sandwiches at 2:00 pm and only "accepted the order to refund it." The communication (or lack thereof) was completely nonexistent and resulted in a waste of my time and money.  The best part, I was not refunded and my card was charged. So glad I have to deal with a credit card dispute tomorrow.
Food is excellent. All freshly prepared. Little on the expensive side but worth it. Sometimes the line moves very slowly

My Southern BLT sandwich was incredible, the macaron was massive and super delicious. Their drinks were really good too, my girlfriends matcha latte has really good and my Jasmine green tea was super high quality. Super good service to top it all off. We'll definitely be back! :)

I've lived across the street for Sunflower Baking Company for a year and am so mad at myself for never giving it a try until now. My boyfriend and I went this morning for breakfast. We both LOVED our food. My matcha latte was absolutely perfect. I even went up again to order more. The macarons are HUGE and delicious! The ladies that work the front counter were so incredibly sweet and work super fast. We are absolutely going to be back.
Everyone is so nice ! The coffee is great & so is the carrot muffin!

We absolutely love Sunflour Baking Company! They serve organic coffee and they have several milk choices as well. Best morning glory muffins and almond croissants! Friendly staff and bright cheery atmosphere!

Amazing experience at this wonderful bakery! The sweet girls behind the counter were very helpful picking out our delicious cookies, they have a great variety of yummy treats, sandwiches,  soups, teas, and coffee. Breakfast sandwiches,  and breads!!! Everyone should check put this SWEET spot for all their yummy cravings!
Very tasty pastry with nice hot drinks.

I love this place. Great coffee and light breakfast items at a reasonable price. I had a cappuccino which was perfectly done. Also had a vegan banana chocolate muffin which was delicious. The place is very nice and functional. Lots of natural light but simple at the same time. There's outdoor seating as well. The staff was kind and fast. This is what a local coffee place should be like. I'm from Atlanta and wish I could find something like this.
Had a very nice cortado and a coconut macaron from here earlier today. Fair prices and delicious items. Definitely check them out if you're in the area.
The pastries are to die for and the service is A+

I am so disappointed by this location! Sunflour is one of my favorite places for a breakfast sandwich and pastry. I have been to all of there locations in the Charlotte & surrounding area. This one continues to have problems. Their pastries are about the only thing that stay consistent. Their #2 is currently a pregnancy craving of mine, I add the basil/walnut pesto with avocado. I have been given the sandwich missing an egg, with an ice cold egg and no cheese, with the tomato pesto instead (which is not good IMO), missing the avocado, etc. It boggles my mind how EVERY SINGLE TIME something is wrong with the sandwich. Ive ordered online, over the phone, and in person. It doesnt matter, wrong everytime. This is the closest location to me and it's still 30 minutes away. I wont be going here anymore sadly and will just have to make the drive to the other locations. The staff seem like they mean well but goodness, someone has got to whip things into shape.
This morning I went to the bakery and ordered a large coffee, black. Unfortunately, it took over 20 minutes to make the coffee. I left and I hope they enjoy their free coffee.
Royal service!
Call ahead for the Jalapeno Cheddar Biscuits!!!  Worth it Everytime

Unfortunately, I was charged twice when using the Sunflour App because  their system went down. They have taken care of this matter and written an apology email including a gift card for the many inconveniences. I am grateful!

We ordered online and the sandwiches (especially the cheddar biscuits) were soooo good! The catch is that the pastries in the display case tasted like they had been sitting in a refrigerator too long, and we ended up getting really sick from them. It's also a little pricey.

Poor customer service. I walked in and cashier was on the phone with her back turned to me for ten minutes.  A young lady walked to the front from the back to help. After I told her picking up online order she went and got it dropped it and turned around and left. Didn't even wait to make sure my order was right. The writing was wrong. The other lady was still on the phone with her back to me. I just left. Doubtful I'll be ordering my cake here again. There are too many cake places to waste my time here. So sad how bad the customer service has become. I have ordered bday cakes here for the past 3 years.
Hands down, the best croissants I've had in the Charlotte area.
This location is best to me. You must try a breakfast sandwich with the English muffin. Lmk how you like it

I called to have a cake made for my birthday and was placed on hold for 20-25 minutes. When I hung up and attempted to call back my calls wouldn't go through. Finally I called private and the phone rung. The person I initially spoke with answered the phone. She said ‚Äúwell‚Ä¶.. I need another 20 minutes.‚Äù Why not say ‚ÄúI'm busy and working by myself‚Äù the first time I called. That would have saved me a lot of time. I decided to contact another company

Very disappointing. Waited 15 minutes for our food and were then told they forgot to make it. Rather than make it right away, they made us wait another 15 minutes while they filled other orders. Sandwiches were severely lacking- sloppily made and mostly bread. Won't return.

Yummy egg sandwiches, LOVE their cheddar biscuits, muffins are delicious, iced coffees are pretty good and the seating inside and out is very nice. They don't do a great job with their hot coffees tho
Delicious sandwiches and  biscuits. Good service. Outside seating.
The cream puff was really good

Just went here today 1-3-22 after a year due to virus...Food still fresh but my Morning Glory muffin has 3 small pockets of baking soda (that's what it tasted like) in it. I'm guessing just simple human error in not mixing the batter correctly. I will go again because for the past few years, I've never had a bad experience here until today.
Good food but customer service is lacking. Tried different locations , excellent bakery.
Great breakfast sandwich! Great coffee
Amazing croissant. Nice place, very good coffee ‚òï.
Really good must try very fresh
Cute little bakery

Sandwich was good.   The rosemary bread was delicious.   Unfortunately they ran out of the pimiento cheese, which I think would have made the sandwich better and is the only reason I'm only giving them 4 stars.

I try to patronize local establishments but  I can no longer support this Sunflour Ballantyne location. I have been going to this bakery periodically for the past 3 years. They have good pastries but their breakfast and lunch sandwiches are disappointing. They are often sloppily prepared or missing an ingredient.  They are also slow in preparing orders. We have to go out of way to come to this store - it is not nearby. After numerous issues, we will just stop patronizing this business.  Also there is supposed to be a mask policy in this store which is clearly indicated by the sign on the front door. We  were wearing our masks when not eating and social distancing from others in the shop, the employee at the register had her mask down under her chin.

I love this place. Friendly/energetic staff, good food, and easy parking. The croissants are spectacularly flaky/messy. There are lots of small tables with outlets, so it's a good spot for a lunch meeting or working remotely.  My only complaints are: 1. The wait time for sandwiches can be particularly long, especially at lunch. 2. I've been told 10 minutes after I place an order (and pay for it) that a certain ingredient/sandwich is out of stock. This specific scenario has happened more than once. I get it that everyone is having supply chain issues right now, but you could let me know before the order is rung up. 3. It really stinks when I open my sandwich at home and see that one or two ingredients on my non-customized order were forgotten. :( This happens not infrequently.
Great food & employees. Anahita & Huda are sooooo nice. Apologize if I misspelled your names.

I put in an order for a cake a few days ago for my son's birthday. When I show up today to pick it up, they didn't make it. They refunded me my money and didn't even offer me a free cookie. It was almond raspberry cake, it's not easy finding Italian desserts in this city
Everything we got was not good. The coffee was the worst.
Good eats and fast service. My family loved it.

By far the BEST croissants in all USA. Go to France for better. But these are the best. Sandwiches are great, French press coffee, excellent. üòã There are other sweets, cupcakes, cookies, key lime pie, tarts, each day is different. Croissants are a staple, order them!
food is always good but the coffee is different every time.. i order the same latte but it never has the same taste or texture.

Stopped in here to grab breakfast and take a meeting before flying home. Amazing double espresso and the best croissant I've had here in the states, easily. Great staff, real coffee, great food. I wish I lived there just to go back again tomorrow

Perfect breakfast place. Stop by for a coffee and some pastries.  They also do cakes if your interested in those. The food is delicious, you can tell that there is time and effort being put into what they make. If you come down later in the day, it's really quiet so it's if your a peaceful person, that time would be great. Location is pretty good too, considering the main ballentyne business centers are not too far from here. Definitely stop by.
Not impressed at all. The prices are extremely high for very basic food
Everything is alwaya amazing at Sunflour bakery. Must try!
They have delicious vegan, gluten free bakery options. The coffee is great; they use Counter Culture beans. I always receive friendly service here!
Healthy food choices. The queue was long. The menu on the internet was slightly different
Don't let wait staff keep tips.
Great vibe! Love the decor! Vegan options! Awesome coffee. Employee was super nice.
The food is amazing! The staff is so kind, helpful, and efficient! Bonus points to the staff member who was so kind and brought our food out to us and said hello to our puppy!
Best customer service ever.
Great service and food especially muffins and breakfast sandwiches.
Muffins & latte was great but the employee‚Ä¶ she was not nice lol.
We love the muffins and breakfast sandwiches.
Great coffee and panini today.  Will be coming back for some baked goods!
It takes 30 minutes to get a sandwich and a breakfast burrito. This wasn't an isolated incident. Every single time I go its at least 20 minutes waiting for a sandwich.

How does a bakery not have eggs on a Sunday morning at 9am? Not exactly an ingredient that cannot be picked up at any local supermarket. This is obviously an extremely poorly managed location which leads to overall poor customer service.

I ordered a gluten free raspberry cake for my daughters birthday, hoping it would be amazing. Unfortunately it was awful, we ended up tossing the cake. Biggest waste of $50.00. Stay away from their gluten free menu.
Nice muffins

Just tried to order ONE breakfast sandwich and they told me it would be 25-30 minute wait for ONE sandwich because a to go order was just called in. Meanwhile two people in back decorating cupcakes. Not appropriately staffed then. Will not return.
Convenient for me, always great and clean. My go to place on the weekends
Bakery goods look tempting. Employees are nice and the interior is clean and you can see the kitchen and the people working.

Great experience here the two times I've been so far! Nice staff, yummy coffee, and the Avocado Melt is delicious, which is a spinach, goat cheese, roasted tomato, walnut pesto and avocado panini. It's so good. I also got an iced vanilla oat milk latte. Highly recommend trying this place!
Great little place to have lunch with a friend, good food.
Great baked goods!!!

Nice place, there are several tables inside and there is an opportunity to sit at tables outside.  The service is fast and friendly.  I liked the fact that many delicacies are baked there themselves.  Pleasant aroma of pastries with a light touch of coffee.
Good place to grab breakfast.
Cozy atmosphere with fresh baked pastries. Lovely place to meet a friend for coffee!
Enjoyed the same great quality food we have had at the Harrisburg location. Cinnamon buns are still my go-to.
Several Gluten Free options (see photos...yes, it's all GF). Everything looked and smelled delicious. Friendly and helpful cashier.
Great food, great staff! Huda served us and was very patient with us. She took our orders and got them all spot on. Very clean all around. Highly recommend! The croissants are the best I've ever had.
Great assortment of vegan muffins. My go to is the Chocolate Chip and Banana muffin.
Enjoyed a great avocado panini and grilled cheese panini followed by a few homemade cookies!  Delish!
Really good sandwiches !! Coffee is excellent. Great choice of vegan pastries and many options for dairy-free alternatives
The best food and coffee.  Super cute.
Best morning glory muffin I've ever tasted.
Lovely!
The morning glory muffin is delicious! If you haven't tried it, you definately should.

Discovered this place by accident to be honest.. but I can say one thing - they have great coffee and amazing pastries! A must try for sure, be it for coffee paired with a delicious pastry or a more substantial meal.
Excellent croissants and breakfast sandwiches. Nice selection of baked goods.
They have great weekend bakery sandwiches.
Great people

First time here, came as a party of two. As most cafes you order pay and then seat yourself. I ordered an orange blossom tea and they iced it for me. The second half of my party ordered herself an iced dirty chai. The drinks were perfect! To go we ordered a chocolate peanut butter cupcake and an individual key lime pie. The place is pleasant and the person who took our order was nice, didn't rush us, and helpful! Thank you. I will be back for sure.
Cheddar biscuits are the best for any breakfast sandwich.

I'm gonna comment on their croissants.  Several years ago my wife and I tried their croissants and at the time we decided these are the greatest croissants we'd EVER eaten... ANYWHERE!  Since then we pretty much try croissants at every bakery we can find to see if there is an equal or better croissant.  We're happy to announce that after 5 years of trying, Sunflour Bakery is STILL the number one croissant we've ever eaten.  There are only two other runner-ups at a place called Mocco Bistro and a place called Crema, both in Charlotte.  Interestingly, many of the other things we try at Sunflour are only meh and almost EVERYTHING we have at Crema is perfect so bear that in mind.  As for croissants Sunflour is the BEST
What a great place to get some pastries, coffee, and a breakfast sandwich. Everything we ordered was delicious and the staff was great. Definitely will be back.
This place is so cute! The scones are amazing and I love the coffee! The service is always so fast! Great place to stop in for breakfast!
üî•üî•üî•üî•üî•
super cute place!

Sunflour Baking is a phenomenal spot to pop into! They have an array of delicious sandwiches, bakery items, and a wide variety of your coffee needs. We had the scrumptious cheddar biscuits as breakfast sandwiches and they were amazing! Highly recommend that as your bread choice! The staff was incredibly kind and welcomed us to the area in the best way! Defintely recommend coming here, so many things to try we will make this a weekly stop!
Fantastic food and drinks and a peaceful bright atmosphere in the heart of ballantyne. Highly recommend.
Great little bakery and cafe
I have door dashed from here several times - the food is outstanding.  The best breakfast sandwich I've ever had!  10/10

No surprise the place was empty on Saturday @ lunch time. The eggs cheddar avocado was the  worst food I've had in a long time. I feel sick after the so called egg... The expresso could not drink, the sour taste must've been from a unclean machine or bad coffee. Just an awful place, I don't think will ever go back...
Delicious offerings!  Morning Glory muffin is my favorite!

I want to give a huge shoutout to Stacey for always providing excellent service every time I've been there to pickup or dining in. I love  the atmosphere and quality of food and drinks. I highly recommend stopping by if you are looking for something delicious or refreshing.

Ordered a breakfast sandwich then waited 30 minutes.  Asked about my order then waited another 15 minutes.  Sandwich finally comes out and I mentioned it took 45 minutes.  I got ‚Äúoh‚Äù from the server.  I understand that they may have to-go orders, but you can't make a quick sandwich for the guy sitting there for a half hour?

I was pleasantly surprised by the selection of gluten free bakery items. I was tempted by the individual GF key lime pie and GF cheesecake, but I got a delicious pumpkin cranberry muffin with a drip coffee. The customer service was excellent as well. My friend got a cookie and a mocha latte that she enjoyed as well.
The food was delicious. The service was great. Reasonably priced.
Great food and drinks , great atmosphere only problem try to avoid busy times
One of the few spots in Charlotte I've found to make a solid cappuccino. Great little hidden spot with really kind employees. Look forward to coming back!!
Great first impression! Beautiful pastries and muffin display. Clean establishment, and everything tastes great!

Wonderful and welcoming staff and lovely coffee - and for those who are taking coffees to go, these lids, cups, stoppers are magical! I had two of four cups flip over onto the top when I took a turn too quickly and only a few drops spilled in the few minutes it took to be able to flip them right side up. I'm still shocked and so thankful!

So, first off, let me say that we love SBC. However, the ballantyne location is horrific. DO NOT GO!!! Not only are they severely understaffed, but they are very unprepared for their customer volume. We placed an order on Saturday morning via their mobile app, and we waiting for our time to get our food.  Good thing we walked in and checked in on the order because they had cancelled our order without even telling us bc they ran out of eggs!!! How is that even possible? Prepare better.  Secondly, when I was giving the young girl a bit of customer feedback on having a better system of letting customers know if their orders had been cancelled (we received no notification whatsoever) - she was EXTREMELY unprofessional rude, and passive aggressive. At that point, I was stunned how she had spoken to me. Not only did she blame ME, the customer, but she couldn't just do the right thing in a customer service role and apologize for the delay and poor service. She copped an attitude and became very passive aggressive.  So, not only are they losing our business, but I am writing this google review to allow others to have a piece of helpful info before ordering from them.  Sunflour Baking Company - choose your employees carefully and wisely. If you do not instruct them on the proper ways to diffuse situations with customers, then they should not be dealing with them. If you teach them and they still do not adhere, then they should not be employed. It's as simple as that. I have over 15+ years in customer service and today I was completely and utterly amazed at how this girl spoke to me.

I have to say that I do not recommend this store. I have a friend who is gluten free and I needed 20 cupcakes for her baby shower. I called 2 days ahead and ordered. First the person that was one the phone had no idea what the flavors were that were available. I will note I  will take ownership that I did not ask how Much the order would be, but the price was not discussed. I figured it would more expensive than traditional cupcakes but goodness 20 cups were $87!! $3.50 per cupcake. A vanilla and/ or chocolate cupcake with pink frosting, nothing fancy!! If I had known I would have ordered 2 for the mom and then gone to Publix and gotten the other 18 for the same price as the 2? I don't get it. My husband said ‚Äú put the gluten back in for that price‚Äù also it's not like they were any bigger than a food lion/ Harris teeter cupcake. This was my first time getting anything here, so not impressed. Not to mention they were running so far behind I had to wait in line just to pick up the preordered cupcakes. The person on the register had no idea what she was doing and they were running out of things for other people who were waiting. So many people waiting on food. Again my first impression was NOPE!!
Just as good as the original! Get the cheddar biscuit or the rosemary bread.

The almond croissant is amazing!!! Also love the biscuit that the bacon, egg, and cheese comes on though I've yet to get actually crispy bacon despite my requests. This is our family's favorite local breakfast place.

I usually love Sunflour and their Dilworth location is great, but I have a couple complaints with this location.  They rarely open on time, which is annoying when you're trying to stop there before work.  Sometimes they open up to 30 minutes late.  Also, their muffins are almost always undercooked and gooey inside (completely raw at times), which is a health hazard.  Every single time I've ordered the Morning Glory muffin it's been raw inside, which is sad because it's my favorite.  If they could fix these two things, I'd be there all the time.

The pastries and coffee here is amazing. You can tell that they use a good quality coffee. The breakfast sandwich and paninis are probably the biggest hidden gem. I ended up going to this place 3 times in a week trying different items because we were so pleased with the products and the customer service.

I ordered a tiramisu 2 days ago, just to try Sunflour for the first time. Tiramisu anywhere I have had it, always is prepared using alcohol. This is what gives it the distinct taste. This dessert was apparently prepared as a child's version, no alcohol. The texture was like an old overcooked cake, not the creamy, moist dessert that tiramisu is. For all that like an authentic tasting  tiramisu this is not it. I haven't tried other desserts here, but I may.

So I ordered a cake about 2 weeks in advance, vegan vanilla cake with vanilla frosting (my sons is allergic to milk and eggs). I asked if they did kids designs, I was looking for a PJ masks cake. They said sure and sent me a picture example of the cake they would make. When the time cake to pick up the cake....it barely looked ANYTHING like the example they sent to us. We paid $45 for a tiny 6‚Äù cake with added decorations that looked like it wasn't worth even $20!! And that's not even mentioning the fact that the inside actual cake was UNDERCOOKED and super dense and mushy (see picture). Here is the example they showed us and then pictures of the cake we picked up.....two stars only because they offer vegan cakes and the staff was friendly.....
all around best breakfast and dessert place recommend to anybody who's looking for fresh baked items - croissants , cupcakes and biscuits. Great friendly staff ! coffee is fresh

Ordered a birthday cake for my wife. They were extremely helpful. Great follow up.  The cake tasted fantastic (we got the triple chocolate). It wasn't too ‚Äúfluffy‚Äù.  Instead, it was very dense and rich. I will definitely order my next cake from here!
Their gluten free vegan carrot cake muffin is delectable.
Glad to have location in ballantyne,
Best pastries on the planet...
Everything I've had has been delicious and served with a smile! They also have a few vegan options as well.

Liked the place a lot....nice atmosphere inside....huge palm in the middle makes up for a tropical feel....loved the eclairs...not too sweet, just as I like it...nice chicken sandwich....good quality coffees....clean and cozy

Second time here for a relaxing Sunday breakfast croissant sandwich and french press coffee both of which are sublime and wondering why I'm not coming to this place every day‚Äîfriendly service and unpretentious atmosphere. Worth checking out especially during the post church service crush when every other place is slammed. Our sandwiches arrived in under ten minutes‚Äîand so amazingly delish.

The cinnamon bun was absolutely fantastic!!! The real deal all the way!!! I also had the bacon, egg, and cheddar on their homemade biscuit bread. It was fantastic! I had an excellent breakfast today!!!

Stopped by to get a treat for kids after a doctors appointment.  Very cute space and loved the tall ceilings.  We got the raspberry eclair (a bit too chilled and wish not so much glaze on pastry portion) and pumpkin/apple muffin (but dry).  They were fine but nothing amazing to bring us back.  I will have to return to try breakfast or lunch and a coffee selection.  One negative (which I don't believe is viable to change) is while eating we saw the restaurant across the way pulling catering pans from a van and just hosing them down and leaving on the ground beside the restaurants trash cans.  Just not a scene you want to view while eating: trash bags and cans and pans being rinsed with hose.

I have been a long time customer of Sunflour Baking Company and sadly I think I will have to move on after today's experience. I have never had a friendly staff experience, but I withstood it bc dang, I love their scones and it was worth it. But today, there was no heat in the space (I wore gloves while indoors), the staff acted as though I was inconveniencing them and their point system was not working today, with no offer of a resolution. I also got charged 75 cents for oat milk without warning, which is not ok for an already overpriced matcha latte. I can't believe I'm saying this but I wish I had gone to Starbucks today instead üòî
A great place for scones, muffins, and cappuccinos!

Visited this spot with family over Thanksgiving. Aesthetically pleasing and the best part as a mom was the outdoor seating area so the kiddos could move around and talk while the adults sat and talked.
My brokers loved the treats I brought in from here. The staff was friendly and quick. Lots of choices to choose from.
Ran out of eggs on Sunday morning! No attempt to get any. Tables and chairs not cleaned.
I am disappointed! No normal coffee cup. No skim milk. Coffee so hot that it is impossible to drink.
They usually run out of everything that's good.  Most people like this place.
This one is bigger and I love this place nice staff

Fabulous bakery for sweets and savory snacks and breakfast sandwiches all day! Love the bacon & eggs and cheese on a croissant! Their cinnamon rolls are incredible! And their cookies and pastries are delicious!!

I go here all the time because it's very close to work. The food is good. The soup is amazing. Baked goods are delicious.  However, the service can be so slow. Recently I've had some bad experiences there because of how busy it is. I went in, spent over $11 for lunch and when I got back to work I found my order was completely wrong. I called, Stacey told me they had a $20 gift card waiting for me and apologized. I let it go and appreciated the customer service. About a week later I go to pick up my gift card. It was VERY busy, lots of "mature" aged people being very particular about things and asking loads of questions. I only get a 30 minute lunch break so I was in a rush to pick up the gift card then leave to pick up my lunch from somewhere else. I waited 15 min just to talk to the new girl at the register to get my card...she filled it out and I rushed out. An hour later I'm at work and pull it out of my purse and realize it's only for $10. So they messed that up to so my gift card didn't even cover the cost of the meal they screwed up. I haven't bothered to call again to rectify it. Again I will say the food is yummy but just so many screw ups lately makes me not want to go back when I usually go at least twice a week.
Very disappointed. Was not happy with the service
Good coffee!
Great place
The sandwiches are old and tasteless. Not sure about the bread. Everything is overpriced. Menu is boring.

Cashier had limited knowledge of the menu and items. Came in and asked what the soup of the day was. She had to ask the manager if they even had soup, which they do not. Ordered the avocado melt, out of avocados. I asked for an additional veggie to be put on my sandwich and she was extremely confused. We asked if the ham was country ham, or sweet ham. She said "I don't know, I haven't tried the ham." And stood there, dumbfounded. We said "anyone you can ask?" She proceeded to ask the kitchen, "has anyone tried the ham?!". They had to read the package it came in, to let us know it was a boars Head honey ham. Asked for the a different sandwich on a cheddar biscuit. They say they are out of cheddar biscuits. The cook chimes in and says they just came out of the oven. We heard them tell multiple people on the phone and in store they were out, even after the fact. Bakery shelves basically empty. We were excited to come here. Poor experience.  Ps. no soap in the men's room. Water jug unfilled.

Web site boasts gluten free, but nothing is available on a daily basis.  Also,  staff was not knowledgable about special orders. Train your staff. I cannot wait for a manager to be on the premises.  It really is a glorified coffee shop, not a bakery.
Delicious!
The Dirty Mocha was excellent though the service is not as fast as I would have liked. The cinnamon buns are wonderful.
Cheddar biscuits. Croissants. Orange hazelnut roll. Cinnamon roll. Fleur de Sal Chocolate Cookie. All are my favorite things at Sunflour Bakery. Yum!
Fabulous breakfast sandwiches.  Live to meet people there.  Always great customer service
Delicious!!!
It had decent options for baked goods and the limeade I got was tasty.
Our first time.  Popped in for Vegan brownies for some company we were having over later. Ended up  having breakfast.  Delish!
Great Place! Highly Recommend
Excellent baked goods

They have the BEST Almond Croissants! They're flaky, buttery, and delicious. I like Sunflour menu and the staff at the Ballantyne location. There is so many items I would recommend on their menu from the cheese biscuits to the key lime pie. This is a great place to eat with great pastries!
Nice quaint place tucked in the corner. Service was good, helpful. Little hot during lunch. May have been A/C issue. 2nd one that day for me.
Great little local bakery in Charlotte. Their blueberry muffin is really delicious. Coffee is local and always hot.
Great pastry nice employees.üòäüòâüçûüç©üç™üç∞ü•êü•ñüíØüëç
A stellar selection and a courteous staff! Great prices and an excellent atmosphere, this is a must visit anytime I'm in the area!

Lovely little bakery and coffee shop that offers a wide range of food options too! I love the decor and atmosphere of this little place. I had a great coffee and chat with a business networking connection here. The iced latte with mocha flavor was outstanding and the morning glory muffin was crispy on the top and so moist and perfectly cooked and flavorful! I'd definitely recommend for anyone in the area to meet or have a nice cup of coffee for a break from the world.
Great coffee, breakfast & pasteries!!  Always fresh and delicious!!  Love that they make it fresh and use great ingredients!! ‚òïü•êüßÅüç™üç∞

Great space, and their product came highly recommended, however I was deeply disappointed by their selection on a Sunday. More importantly, the dining and patio areas were a hot mess, and the bathrooms even worse. I even asked for a towel to wipe down my table and the girl was very sweet to say she'd come do it, but showed up with a dry towel, didn't even wipe down the whole table, and didnt bother with the other surrounding tables. As a previous owner of a business, I felt the need to share...this place needs better management! No product is good enough in a dirty setting!

Absolutely delicious place to grab breakfast, lunch, or just a quick treat! Their rosemary bread is to die for. As a plus, they even have a few vegan and gluten free options, making it a win for everyone!
Got my boyfriend a birthday cake here and it looked nice on the exterior but it was very dry and crumbly. Thought it would taste better for $35.
Loved my dirty latte! I cant wait to come back and try the food!

Two words. Cheddar biscuits. Three more. Morning glory muffins. Ask them to make you a caramel latte with their house made caramel. You're set. I really haven't had anything bad here. Staff is always super nice and place is always clean. Love their reward system. Always end up getting something extra with my points.
They make the most amazing chocolate chip scones and chai latte. Love the place. Excellent luncg set up with great sandwiches.
loved pimento BLT!

Line gets long quick at lunch time.  Cashier seemed spacey and unfamiliar many things.  They were out of soup at 12pm.  There were plenty of sweets to chose from. Cupcakes were delicious. Coffee and sandwich was good as well.

I love this place and try to stop in whenever I can.  If you are a fan of cinnamon rolls, they have one of the best that I've ever tasted...and I've been eating cinnamon rolls for a long time.  They have vegan choices, cakes, muffins, sandwiches, and more.  Highly recommend.

Meh. Might be an OK Cafe for coffe and baked goods but the sandwich menu is mediocre. The biggest issue I had was service. Staff was pleasant but ill prepared and under staffed, also got an order wrong. Stock was low on a few items. Probably more of a management issue but this isn't going to cut it for lunch in Ballantyne.
Amazingly fresh and not overly sweet.
Cheerful atmosphere, delicious breakfast and coffee.
Great cinnamon role and coffee!  I would drive past the other place to get coffee here just because they have awesome lids for their cups!
Great little Cafe where you can find some peace and quite to get homework done.
Had the avocado melt on rosemary sourdough! Exceptionally delicious.
It's okay.
Awesome coffeeshop with lots of sunlight and great coffee and tea. Lots of vegan options for lunch and snacks too!

I want to first say I dont hate this place but I am not a huge fan. I got a breakfast sandwich from there(3) and I ended up giving mine to my boyfriend cause I didn't like it. I got a bacon egg and cheese on multigrain: it was dry and bland tasting. My boyfriend had the ham, egg and cheese and he loved it. For the money they cost I was extremely disappointed! I been getting coffee there recently and that is nothing special. Its not terrible coffee but not great either. Best part about this place is staff(super friendly) and pastries which I tried before.
Cold brew and Vegan muffin was delicious! Cant wait to try the rest!
Good selection, but get there early

Went in Saturday at around 4pm. Wanted a slice of Chocolate Cake and a tiramisu pastry. Only one chocolate cake left in pie case and they would not cut it for us. Instead gave us a piece of Birthday Cake which turned out to be dry as a bone. Must have been at least 2 days old. The Tiramisu was no better! It should have had  ladyfingers that were soaked in coffee and the Mascarpone that should have been light and airy. Forget It!! It was dry and everything else was hard as crust from stale bread. Im pretty sure it was one or two days old.   Never go there again!!!
My husband and I frequently get a pastry (or 3) on Sunday mornings. The cinnamon buns are to die for! The staff is always super sweet and courteous.

Some of the best vegan treats you'll find around Charlotte. I love the chocolate banana muffins and chia puddings, plus there's always a surprise like sandwich cookies or cupcakes. Always worth stopping in.
Nice quiet area for a snack or lunch

I had been wanting to try this place, so when I saw a Groupon for it, I jumped on it.  We went on a Saturday around 11 and it wasn't crowded at all. You order at the counter, find a table, and they bring your food out to you.  We got the bacon, egg, and cheddar sandwich on a cheddar biscuit, the frankly french toast (seasonal), and the black Friday panini. The french toast was my favorite. It had really good flavors. I also liked the bacon, egg, and cheddar sandwich. The cheddar biscuit was my favorite part. I thought the black Friday panini was just ok.  I also got a chai tea latte which was really good. It was spicy and not too sweet. My husband got a dirty chai in a cone. He was not a fan. He thought the cone made the portions off. You also pay more for the cone but get less drink.  I think this cafe is worth checking out!
Great spot for delicious coffee and bakery items!
Ordered 6 cupcakes and they were dry, audibly hard, and seemingly old. The frosting was tasty but the entire cupcake was generally inedible. Service was good and staff were friendly.

We ordered food and coffee today. Quality of food was good, however, the ladies could use a little additional training to improve their customer service when it gets a little busy. Management should improve their standards for service for the ballantyne area. Also, they got 1 out of 4 coffee drinks correct.
Out of cinnamon rolls and decaf coffee. Crossiant was burnt. Other than that it was fine.
Great staff, upbeat and energetic. The baked goods are phenomenal.  Flaky croissants, delicious from beginning to end .

Great spot in south Charlotte (ballentyne) for breakfast or lunch.  Top notch coffee with a. Great selection of baked goods including muffins, scones (lemon rosemary is great!) and Eclairs.  Skip the line at Starbucks and head over here.  They also have two for one day old muffins and scones.  Super clean bathrooms. A must try.   A+
I love this bakery!!!
For some reason this location is not as good as the one in south end. I've tried their latte's a few times and they're never very good.
A nice quiet location with good food and coffee.
I'm always a fan of Sunflour. The perfect spot to meet for coffee dates or grab a quick lunch.

1st time at this location after being impressed with the location on 7th street. Spent $22 on food and planned to connect to the free wifi to  get work done on my laptop. Logging into the Wi-Fi took longer than expected. So I inquired about the wifi and was informed that it was out of service. I expressed my disappointment and requested a refund. I received a full refund. Advice: ask if the wifi is working if you need to use it before ordering. Menu options are not cheap. 3* for Wi-Fi issue and service.
The food is good, but the customer service is absolutely terrible, and the staff is less than friendly and inviting. Delayed food, lack of teamwork from the team. Maybe the one in Dilworth is better.
Great place

If you're going to advertise all these gluten free options make sure you stick to what you say. I came in and they had 2 small things for GF options. I couldn't even get a GF sandwich. Why advertise it and then not serve it?
I love this place. The fresh baked goods are always delicious.
A complete WASTE time.. food is pretty good IF they do have what you're looking for which is pretty rare. Double think  before you wait in lime and finally get let down by the poor selection. :(

My husband loves this place and I won't pretend I don't as well. The spinach tomato breakfast sandwich on sourdough is my favorite while he goes with bacon egg and cheese on a crossaint. The egg is a scramble bake and the only option. So just beware of that if expecting fried eggs. The baked goods are all also awesome. I like the seed bars, yum. On the weekends the line gets out of control around 9 so go early. When not crazy busy, it's a lovely spot to sit and eat.

Had Vanilla Bean Cupcake with Vanilla Frosting and Vanilla Cupcake with Chocolate frosting- their cupcakes are wonderfully balanced. All the components of a good cupcake: Excellent frosting to cake ratio, Not to sweet, Not to fluffy, not dry at all-but not overly moist and flavorful. To me a good cupcake leaves you able to eat another without feeling weighed down. They've achieved that here.  Also had Iced Cinnamon Roll- one of the best I've ever had. Again not to sweet, not dry- but not overly moist, cinnamonny, good size...this is what I cinnamon roll should be. Again...the right balance so that taking  a bite is satisfying...not "too much".  This bakery has really impressed me! They know their craft and the science in making balanced and satisfying goods. Brava Sunflour! Brava!
What a bakery should be

Lukewarm. Couldn't get a basic sandwich right that was just above their heads on the menu. Had to come out twice. It was good when it finally came out though.  Pastries very dry and crumbling. Coffee very acidic and hard to stomach. Expensive as well. Nowhere near as good as the 7th St location.

Nice decor, friendly staff... but I didn't get a chance to try anything. I only get to eat one sweet treat a week( per my diet) and I was DYING for a plain old chocolate cupcake. Unfortunately by 1130a on a Sunday they were "completely out" of plain old chocolate. I was able to get one from another local bakery,  which was enough to satisfy my craving. But I was really looking for something amazing in this very precious moment.  I will try again this weekend...
Good sandwiches though I feel they should offer fruit on the side. Get the cream cheese frosted cinnamon roll!! It should be illegal.
There are a lot of chain restaurants in Charlotte. This place has a few vegan pastry, soup, and sandwich options which is nice.

The sandwiches were not what we expected for the price we paid. Also, there was nothing given with the sandwiches (like a pickle or chips), just the sandwich on a plate. The clerk and server were not especially friendly either. In short, given the other places to eat, we will not go back.
I've only had pastries at this location, but everything I have had has been outstanding. Very fresh and very homemade
Staff is very friendly and they always do their best! Sarah and the other baristas are amazing!
Delicious food,  fast service and friendly staff
Excellent place for a Special Occasion breakfast

The food is delicious!! The wait is ridiculous! I was in line for 15 minutes, there were only three people ahead of me?? Why did it take so long?? The customer service was so-so. And all the tables had crumbs on them?? I'm hoping someone called in sick and they were just shorthanded, I'll definitely give this location another chance, but based on my experience at the dilworth location, I think this company just need to work out the kinks in there logistics.
Do you like bread, muffins, sweets, and sandwiches. If not do not come here.
Some of the best breakfast sandwiches and coffee I've ever had. The cupcakes are delicious too!
Amazing cheddar biscuits!!
Truly a special place, they are making a name for themselves, and they deserve it, food is really good.
Good sandwiches, good soup, good chai
Delicious sandwiches and coffee. My only wish is that they offered gluten-free bread.

Best-tasting vegan foods. Several visually appealing vegan and non-vegan items I've seen in one place in Charlotte. Lots of variety and so many options. Vegan chocolate chip cookies are better than any chocolate chip cookies you've likely every had in your life! They should be called 'Best Chocolate Chip Cookies' and made way more often.

Nothing exceptional about this place whatsoever. The eclair we got tasted old, the sandwich we got had eggs on par with McDonald's, and the latte was incredibly weak and lacked the velvety rich consistency that other lattes have at other cafes. With rush espresso being right across the street don't bother with this place.
Wonderful sandwiches.  Love the service.  Nice people there.

My sis in law recommended this place. Since cupcake delirium is close til new years, I wanted to find somewhere else to get my cupcake fix. I was not satisfied. First of they did not have a lot of flavors like cupcake delirium did but I did try 1 cupcake first before getting a lot just to make sure it was good. The only one that I liked out of 5 cupcakes was the salted caramel chocolate cupcake one. I could tell it just came out of the oven. The coconut one and red velvet from the fridge was hard and just didn't satisfy my craving at all. It seemed like it was old. Maybe that's why it was in the fridge? I saw good reviews but maybe I just got a bad batch. It was not worth $3.25. I also didn't like that they didn't have special pricing for getting half a dozen or a dozen.
Great sandwich
Everything is wonderful!
Food is delicious! Staff is friendly, they don't look down on you despite being in an affluent area. Look forward to another visit

Was in the area and excited that I saw this location. I've attempted to stop in before at their other location closer to the city, but couldn't find parking. Had a breakfast sandwich on their butter roll. It was very tasty! I wish they had ice tea that was the help yourself option and the interior seems like they skimped a bit on cost. Overall it was a great breakfast while I was in the area.
Best cheddar biscuits in the world.

This is a new place that just opened up and I must say I am a huge fan!  The place  Located in the a plaza they call the Quad it is in a really nice plaza in town with lets of shops around it. The inside is really nice. They have a good amount of tables plus a high bar top. Very well done and the bathrooms are clean.  The food  I had a Bacon egg and cheese on a Croissant. Can I say WOW!!! One of the best breakfast sandwiches I have ever had. I really wish I wasn't so full so I could have tried many of there amazing looking baked goods. I will be back to try them sometime. The only reason they didnt get a five star is due to my french press I ordered was luke warm. There is nothing worse than luke warm coffee.  The verdict  This place is nothing short of awesome I loved going here and I can not wait to come back to try some of the lunch options and baked goods!
